author: Phil Vickery
method: Place the nuts into a frying pan over a medium heat and fry until golden. Place the sugar and spices into a mortal and pestle or spice grinder and grind together. To serve, transfer the hot nuts into a serving bowl and sprinkle over the sugar and spice mixture.
ingredients: 5 tbsp cashew nuts,  2 tbsp soft brown sugar,  1 tsp chilli powder,  ½ tsp turmeric,  ½ tsp paprika,  ½ tsp cumin seed
